title: Ticket #2907: glexec new default umask causes issues
description:
Recent versions of glexec have changed the default umask to 077. This breaks Condor-glexec integration.

The issue is that condor_glexec_setup will call "mkdir" to create the sandbox. This previously resulted in a sandbox with perms 0755; it now results in 0700 (owned by the payload).

Condor will then attempt to chdir to the sandbox (as the pilot) and invoke glexec again. For the new behavior, the chdir fails due to EPERM and the job goes on hold.

This can be fixed by using "install -m 755 -d" instead of "mkdir -p" in condor_glexec_setup.
